description: In this tutorial, we show how to create a Jupyter Notebook environment using our Web Interface.
title: Exabyte.io Tutorial: Jupyter Notebook Environment

youTubeCaptions.text: Create a simulation, by navigating to the job designer page.
Then, <break time='0.5' /> open the workflow tab, and choose the 'Jupyter Notebook' workflow by selecting it in the list.
After that, <break time='0.5' /> navigate to compute tab, and set compute configuration. Here, we use the default configuration.
Then, <break time='0.5' /> set the name for the job. Here, we call it - Jupyter Notebook Environment.
Next, <break time='0.5' /> save the job. <break time='1.0' /> It can then be selected and submitted to the compute queue, for execution.
The status of the calculation will change from pre-submitted to submitted, and then to active.
When the job is active, open it, to access Jupyter Notebook environment.
